prediction.health: You are going to feel very energetic today. This is a suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. You will be at the best of your physical shape. Group activities will benefit you.

prediction.luck: You may get some good news today which will make you happy. Lady Luck will be smiling at your efforts.

prediction.health: You will maintain perfect health throughout the day. Your courageous and determined nature will keep you in fine shape. Today is a great day to start new fitness regime.

prediction.health: Health shall remain average. There will be no serious physical ailment. However, don’t ignore any health related issues today.
prediction.emotions: Peace and harmony shall prevail. Keep away from unnecessary arguments and stress.
prediction.profession: Progress in work will be normal. You shall achieve success in proportion to the efforts put in. avoid taking important long term decisions relating to career and finance. Remarks by colleague or boss can create mental stress.
prediction.luck: You shall enjoy average luck today. Don’t try to push too hard.
prediction.personal_life: You will succeed in impressing your beloved. You shall be happy and satisfied in your personal life. You shall share a loving relation with your children. You will enjoy the company of good friends.
prediction.travel: Avoid travelling today, unless absolutely necessary.

prediction.health: Persons suffering from blood pressure and diabetes should be careful today about their health today. Take precautions against allergies and viral infections. Try to keep your stress level low. Activities such as yoga and meditation would help you.
prediction.emotions: You will be in a confused and agitated state of mind today due to some emotional issues that have arisen in your life.
prediction.profession: You might be overburdened with work today making you very short tempered. Think rationally, do not lose your cool and do not take hasty decisions. You need to be patient in executing projects; pointless actions and anger can give trouble.
prediction.luck: Avoid taking major decisions or starting anything new today as things might not go as per your expectations.
prediction.personal_life: Your own people are likely to obstruct your work. Beware of secret enemies. Today, you are likely to be troubled with confrontations at work and home. Success, in matters of love, will be delayed. Romantic moves will not pay.
prediction.travel: Minor problems might crop up the last minute which might force you to cancel an outing you had planned.

prediction.health: Minor health issues shall spoil your mood today. Take care of your health and eat your meals properly. Avoid any exertion. Don't over burden your body with too much activity; instead treat yourself to a day or two of rest.

prediction.personal_life: Avoid confrontations and arguments. Rift with your loved ones is possible. Do not allow the conflict to develop: compromise before things get out of hand. Control your temper. In certain situations you will find it difficult to deal with others and this will result in you feeling rather stressed.
